title: Real Time Chat App
description: A real-time chat app with React and Socket.io, featuring live messaging, user authentication, and smart notifications.

title: Real-time Collaborative Editor
description: A real-time web-based editor for creating, editing, and sharing documents with collaborative multi-user support.

title: Full-stack e-commerce website
description: A full-stack clothing website with secure Firebase authentication, Razorpay payments, and a responsive React UI backed by MongoDB.
